title: Recycling Hero Challenge
text: Learn how to sort your waste and give new life to plastic, paper, and glass. Become a real recycling hero by completing fun tasks that help keep our planet clean!

title: Save water, Save the Planet
text: Discover how small actions can save big amounts of water! Practice turning off the tap, using only what you need, and protecting one of Earthâ€™s most precious resources.

title: Switch Off & Shine
text: Become an energy saver! Learn when to turn off lights, unplug devices, and reduce electricity waste. Every switch you flip helps the planet shine brighter.

title: Too Good To Go Away
text: Join the fight against food waste! Learn how to plan meals, store food properly, and get creative with leftovers. Every bite counts in saving food and helping the planet.

title: Green Commuter Challenge
text: Discover fun and eco-friendly ways to get around! Walk, bike, or use public transport to reduce pollution and make your daily commute a green adventure.

title: Plastic-Free Pioneer
text: Take the lead in reducing plastic waste! Learn about alternatives to single-use plastics and how to make sustainable choices that protect our oceans and wildlife.
